item.description:
Come out for some terrific Vietnamese food in Springfield, MA. There have been some great reviews of Pho Saigon and the prices are surely within everyone's budget. They have everything from fried egg rolls to noodles to grilled catfish. They also have a variety of vegetarian dishes. Hope you can make it!
P.S. I will be asking for a voluntary $1 to $2 donation to be applied toward the cost of the meet up group for those in attendance at this event.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Pho Saigon in Springfield
